TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local islands = CountCardsSubtypeZonePlayer( LAND_TYPE_ISLAND, ZONE_IN_PLAY, EffectController() ) local swamps = CountCardsSubtypeZonePlayer( LAND_TYPE_SWAMP, ZONE_IN_PLAY, EffectController() )
if TriggerObject() ~= nil and islands < 1 and swamps < 1 then TriggerObject():ComesIntoPlayTapped() end
